Plot: When Coen gets a disturbing call from a clinic in Bangkok informing him that his brother David is seriously ill, Coen decides to follow the footsteps of his brother to find out what happened to him.
Title: Lost in Laos
Writer: Jonathan Kray (story), Jonathan Kray, Vincent Lodder (story), Vincent Lodder
Actors: Chia Moua Julengkao, Jonathan Kray, Vincent Lodder, Paul John Macormaic
